```{r}
# List all CSV files
file_list <- list.files(
  path = here::here("Raw_files"),
  pattern = "\\.csv$",
  full.names = TRUE
)

# Read and combine into one data frame
all_data_probe <- file_list %>%
  map_dfr(~ read_csv(.x, col_types = cols(participant = col_character())))
```

```{r}
probe_data <- all_data_probe  |> 
  select(participant, item_type, list_id, string, key_resp_2.corr, font, stim_file,key_resp_probe.keys, ) |> 
  drop_na()
```

```{r}

```


```{r}
#m print z = cursive
# if key matches font 1 else 0

probe_data_acc <- probe_data |>
  filter(key_resp_2.corr==1) |>
  mutate(probe_acc = ifelse(key_resp_probe.keys=="z" & font=="cursive", 1, ifelse(key_resp_probe.keys=="m" & font=="print", 1, 0)))

write.csv(probe_data_acc, file="probe_data.csv")

```
